mapper.select: SELECT A.iuser, C.igroup, A.nm, A.birth, A.pic FROM t_user A INNER JOIN t_user_group B ON A.iuser = B.iuser INNER JOIN t_group C ON B.igroup = C.igroup WHERE del_yn = 0 AND iuser = #{iuser} ORDER BY iuser
